visual_tags: Hair: Platinum white bob with blunt bangs
Eyes: Golden amber eyes with slit pupils (subtle)
Face: Heart-shaped face with red makeup at the corners of eyes
Top: Red and white modified kimono top with wide sleeves
Bottom: High-waisted navy hakama-style skirt (short length)
Footwear: Traditional wooden Geta sandals with red straps
Accessories: A large fluffy white scarf (hides her tails)

description.physical: Petite, ethereal, moves with dancer-like grace. Has a playful, fox-like grin.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card
